name: Milk
description: The liquid made from milk which is regarded as the most nutritious food for children's growth. It can restore 27-37 points of HP.

name: Million Victory
description: The dynamic figures not only contain people's expectation and hope, but also combine countless love and faith. Unique styles are designed only for you to take part in this new adventure. Novices! The adventure starts here!

name: Million Victory [1]
description: The dynamic figures not only contain people's expectation and hope, but also combine countless love and faith. Unique styles are designed only for you to take part in this new adventure. Novices! The adventure starts here!

name: Mini Eleking Growth Pack
description: A pack prepared for Mini Eleking to help with its quick growth.  Open to gain guaranteed 2x Cosmic Soup, 1x Lv.7 Talent Fruit, 10x Pet EXP Potion (L), 10x Ultraman’s Cosmic Breath

name: Mini Parasol
description: It may look stupid but it will protect you from sunburn. You could also use it during the rain, i guess?

name: Mini Propeller
description: Hairband that makes you feel you're flying in the sky when wearing it.

description: Hairband that makes you feel you're flying in the sky when wearing it.

description: Hairband that makes you feel you're flying in the sky when wearing it.

name: Mink Coat
description: A coat made of soft animal fur. It is seriously criticized by animal protection organization.

name: Minorous Horn
description: Headdress made according to the Minorous Horn. It's easier to get excited when seeing red stuff after wearing it.

name: Miracle Christmas Chest
description: The package received by completing chest quest in Gingerbread City. Open it to find Snowman and special materials of Gingerbread City, with a large probability to find Boss materials, a small probability to receive advanced Blueprint.

name: Miracle Reappear
description: Officially Authorized!  Ultraman Tiga’s OP. You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra.  This item is limited. Don’t waste it~ [Do you feel like a kid once more upon hearing this familiar piece of music?]

name: Mirror Shield
description: An armor made of mirror, with high degree of defense against Atk.
effect: Str ＋5,Damage of [Shield Chain], [Shield Boomerang] ＋15%, SP cost ＋30%

name: Miss Conch
description: The giant tropical conch of Kemo Island is home to the warm and lovely obeaune! ~
effect: Max HP ＋500,Reduces Def and MDef of nearby enemies within a 3m radius by 4%.
